parameters.query: SELECT e.id, e.last_name, e.first_name, e.positions, e.is_mobile, r.name AS restaurant_name, r.id AS restaurant_id, COALESCE(e.employment_type, 'full_time') AS employment_type, e.fixed_day_off, e.max_hours_per_week FROM employees e JOIN restaurants r ON e.restaurant_id = r.id WHERE e.active = TRUE ORDER BY r.id, e.last_name;
